meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Vinita Kailasanath Ken Jennings Michael Falk Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6809.

div.div: Battle of the Decades: The 2000s game 4.

td.p: Vinita Kailasanath, an attorney from Washington, D.C.
Ken Jennings, a writer from Seattle, Washington
Michael Falk, a junior high school math teacher from West Allis, Wisconsin

tr.td: THE LONG & THE SHORT OF IT
FAIRLY RECENT NEWS
PHILOSOPHERS
MUSIC OF THE 2000s
small state capitals
OUR OLD PAL WATSON

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '[Alex does an impression of the "Pillsbury Doughboy" laugh after reading the clue.]
...
(Alex: The city is [*], the Pillsbury family, and I hope everybody appreciated my little "hoo, hoo, hoo!" I don\'t do it very well.)
[Laughter]
VinitaWhat is Buffalo?
$2,000
MichaelWhat is Philadelphia?
$2,400
KenWhat is Boston?
$3,200
Minneapolis')

In 1884 George Pillsbury became mayor of this city
Michael
Ken
Vinita
2nd place: $5,000
Quarterfinalist
3rd place: $5,000
Michael
Ken
Vinita

14 R,
4 W
(including 1 DD)

24 R
(including 2 DDs),
3 W
